## California Community Schools Partnership Program (CCSPP)

**Annual Progress Report (APR)**

These visualizations reflect the data from the CCSPP APR for school sites for the **2022-2023 school year, the 2023-2024 school year and initial findings from the 2024-2025 school for the Capacity Building Strategies.**

Reports are reflective of the data aggregated by **Region**.

Select specific report on the left.
